text: Hey There, I submitted my theme for review. And after submitting I made a few corrections to my theme. Should I have to remove my theme from the queue and again I have to submit it? Because I can’t see any option to update the theme.

Hi Ankit, thank you for reaching out. If your theme has an ‘Approval pending’ status, you can select the theme in your listings manager, select the ‘Remove from approval queue’ option, and then resubmit the theme. If your theme is set to ‘published’ or ‘unapproved’ you can select the ‘edit listing/draft’ option.
Alright!!! Thank you for your quick response.
